content: this is a written pattern for karmina the monster the finished size of karmina is approximately 15cm this pattern is made with a 4mm hook and yarn for that size but the size of the yarn and hook can be switched to make bigger/smaller toys also for this pattern i use 10 mm safety eyes i am sure you can also use beads but i haven t tried it please be aware that safety eyes/beads can be harmful for small children you can always embroider the eyes if the toy is intended for small kids the pattern also contains instructions to make crocheted eyes slightly_smiling_face hope you enjoy making your own karmina
